messages.messageBody:
To unsubscribe from this group, click on the following link or address an email to:
Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com

Visit the Unschooling website: http://www.unschooling.com

Kathy Sullivan:
Mom to Logan 15, Andrew 10, Alexander 6 1/2, and Christopher David 14 months.

"Some people think that we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know that to hold a child IS life"

"To be free to learn, children must be free to dream!"

----- Original Message -----
From: rosemary grayson
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, December 13, 2002 8:13 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Balance


please delete my subscription

please cancel
please cancel

thank you!!!
rosemary grayson
